431060.name: Astro Lords: Alien Weapon
431060.description:
This package gives access to Alien technologies.
The unique ammunition "Death Ray" is sold in the game only for Tritium, and the "Through Creeping Laser", which can only be found on alien asteroids, pierces through all ships and Barriers of opponents. A Shield-Ignoring Laser Penetration can be very effective when used in conjunction with the upgrades in this package that significantly increase its damage.
Arev runes increase damage from lasers, golden Aran will make reloading faster, and runes in addition to Arud increase damage by all types of weapons.
All runes in this package work twice as long as standard ones!

DLC "Alien Weapons" includes:
Runes:
  • "Arev" Bronze Increase Min and Max damage of all lasers + 5%
  • "Arev" Silver Increase Min and Max damage of all lasers + 10%
  • "Arev" Gold Increase Min and Max damage of all lasers + 15%
  • "Arud" Bronze Increase Min and Max damage of all weapons + 5%
  • "Arud" Silver Increase Min and Max damage of all weapons + 10%
  • "Arud" Gold Increase Min and Max damage of all weapons + 15%
  • "Aran" Gold Reloading of all types of weapons -10%

Weapon:
  • Penetrating Laser: 300 pcs.
  • Through creeping laser: 150 pcs.
  • Death Ray: 50 pcs.


How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.
